title: 游댮 CRITICAL: Fix Database Connection Timeout Issues
body:
## Problem Description
The monitoring API experiences frequent database connection timeouts, causing data loss and degraded user experience.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Database connections maintain stability for 24+ hours
- [ ] Automatic reconnection on failure
- [ ] Connection pooling implemented
- [ ] Error handling prevents data loss

## Definition of Done
- All database operations have retry logic
- Connection pool configured with optimal settings
- Monitoring alerts for connection failures
- Zero data loss during reconnection

## Relevant Files
- `main.py`
- `production_config.py`

**Time Estimate:** 1-2 days

title: 游댮 CRITICAL: Implement Real-time Error Recovery System
body:
## Problem Description
When tablets lose connection or crash, there's no automatic recovery mechanism, requiring manual intervention.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Auto-reconnection after network loss
- [ ] Graceful error handling
- [ ] Session persistence across restarts
- [ ] User notification system

## Definition of Done
- Tablets auto-recover from 95% of errors
- Recovery time < 30 seconds
- No manual intervention required
- Error logs accessible via dashboard

## Relevant Files
- `scripts/tablet_client_bulletproof.py`
- `static/dashboard_clean.html`

**Time Estimate:** 2-3 days
